cast.name: 伊赫斯·贝尔本 Iris Berben
迪特里希·布鲁格曼 Dietrich Brüggemann
克里斯蒂娜·格罗斯 Christina Große
罗伯特·格维斯戴克 Robert Gwisdek
奥利维·柯里特克 Oliver Korittke

introduction: ky Alky is the tragicomic story of Tobias and ‘Flasche,’ two best friends and classic cases of arrested development - partying, boozing, and self-destructing like a couple of idiotic teenagers. This would be fine except for the fact that Tobias is in his mid-40s with a wife and children. But he and Flasche continue to rock the nights away in discos and raves, partying with people young enough to be their children. Their nights are spent drinking themselves into oblivion, their days are spent in bed, nursing the mother of all hangovers.Tobias gradually realizes that this friendship is no longer good for him, that it is time for him and Flasche to go their separate ways, but it is already much too late. The self-destructive, murderous downward spiral continues until things get really gnarly.
